name: Sacred Circle
description:
Deep in the forest lies everything you need to create your own, unique Sacred Circle. Find a moment of peace, balance and focus in this meditative mandala maker. 

Share your creation with us by either adding #SacredCircleGame to your post, or tagging us on Twitter. You can find us at:

@BsMcInnes | @AdoneKitching

Nature assets  by Luis Fernández (@luyssport)
https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/plants-kit-6c2980169c1e44e499d94a67c1752477

Note: The downloadable version has an exporter that lets you save out your creations.
